meanings.sent1: The class learned about different photographic techniques.
meanings.sent2: She admired the photographic skills of the professional photographer.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to take a photographic selfie with its paw on the camera.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a photographic image, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted a photographic scene across the sky.

meanings.definition: Resembling a photograph in clarity or detail.
meanings.sent1: The new TV had a photographic display that made the images look real.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was so photographic that it was mistaken for a photo.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with photographic precision, each detail perfect.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photographic memory card, storing every moment.
meanings.sent5: The mountain view was so photographic, it felt like stepping into a picture.
